ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle grapefruit flavored soda (such as FrescaÂ®), chilled
1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle white grape juice, chilled
des: "A yummy, simple drink with white grape juice and grapefruit soda. Great for parties, showers, or just for fun!!!"
ins: Mix together the grapefruit soda and grape juice in a large bowl. Serve in champagne or punch glasses.
